feature.name: Spectral Centroid
feature.description: The centre of mass of the power spectrum.

feature.name: Derivative of Spectral Rolloff Point
feature.description: Derivative of Spectral Rolloff Point.The fraction of bins in the power spectrum at which 85% of the power is at lower frequencies. This is a measure of the right-skewedness of the power spectrum.

feature.name: Derivative of Zero Crossings
feature.description: Derivative of Zero Crossings.The number of times the waveform changed sign. An indication of frequency as well as noisiness.

feature.name: Derivative of Strongest Frequency Via Zero Crossings
feature.description: Derivative of Strongest Frequency Via Zero Crossings.The strongest frequency component of a signal, in Hz, found via the number of zero-crossings.

feature.name: Standard Deviation of Strongest Frequency Via Zero Crossings
feature.description: Standard Deviation of Strongest Frequency Via Zero Crossings.The strongest frequency component of a signal, in Hz, found via the number of zero-crossings.

feature.name: Derivative of Strongest Frequency Via Spectral Centroid
feature.description: Derivative of Strongest Frequency Via Spectral Centroid.The strongest frequency component of a signal, in Hz, found via the spectral centroid.

feature.name: Derivative of Running Mean of Strongest Frequency Via Spectral Centroid
feature.description: Derivative of Running Mean of Strongest Frequency Via Spectral Centroid.Running Mean of Strongest Frequency Via Spectral Centroid. The strongest frequency component of a signal, in Hz, found via the spectral centroid.

feature.name: Strongest Frequency Via FFT Maximum
feature.description: The strongest frequency component of a signal, in Hz, found via finding the FFT bin with the highest power.

feature.name: Derivative of Strongest Frequency Via FFT Maximum
feature.description: Derivative of Strongest Frequency Via FFT Maximum.The strongest frequency component of a signal, in Hz, found via finding the FFT bin with the highest power.

feature.name: ConstantQ
feature.description: signal to frequency transform using exponential-spaced frequency bins.
